# langsmith_ttl_settings (Resource)

Manages LangSmith workspace trace retention (TTL) settings. This is a singleton resource that always exists per workspace.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `longlived_ttl_days` (Number) The number of days to retain longlived traces.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The identifier of the TTL settings (set to the tenant ID).
- `is_custom` (Boolean) Whether a custom TTL policy is configured.
- `tenant_id` (String) The workspace tenant ID.
